price: Ìwọ̀nyí ni àwọn āyah Allāhu, tí À ń ké e fún ọ pẹ̀lú òdodo. Àti pé dájúdájú ìwọ wà lára àwọn Òjíṣẹ́.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wa-innaka lamina al-mur'salīna
